name: plagiarist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who uses another person's ideas or work and pretends that it is their own: The reporter was shown to be a liar and a plagiarist. The self-confessed plagiarist admits that his new novel borrows from his own past work "hugely". See
plagiarize
More examplesFewer examplesThe paper unmasked one of its reporters as a serial plagiarist and fraud. Although the man is a plagiarist, he is not a deliberate plagiarist. Plagiarists are not clever or they'd be doing their own work.
